name: Scythe of Cronus
shortDescription: The Adamantine Sickle - Weapon of Cosmic Overthrow
fullDescription:
The Adamantine Sickle - Weapon of Cosmic Overthrow The Scythe of Cronus (also called the Harpe or Adamantine Sickle) is the primordial
                    weapon forged by Gaia, the Earth Mother, to enable the overthrow of Uranus, the
                    tyrannical Sky Father. This terrible implement, made from unbreakable adamantine,
                    was used by Cronus to castrate his father - an act that simultaneously freed the
                    Titans and established the cosmic order that would precede the Olympian age.
